title: Reader's Digest - February 1945 (gnv64)
description:
Reader's Digest - February 1945
English | scanned PDF | 132 pages | 11.1 mb

This is a issue of Reader's Digest from February 1945. 
Most articles are WW II-related. Others are about children being kept in adult jails, bootleg nylon pantyhose and that wonderful new invention, fiberglass (the last two not the same story).  End piece is a British commentary on the social problems in India. 
Scanned @ 300 DPI, pages are four-color printing with minor illustrations and accents. I have edited the original 252 mb PDF with OCR & bookmarks reducing it to 11 mb.
